text:
The food here exceeds my expectations! I was expecting bar snacks only but they had a whole range of mains and both fish and chip and the white wine clam spaghetti turned out great.

Highly recommend this place if you’re looking for some place easy going serving western cuisine.
Pork knuckles is very good. Food menu is quite extensive and their food taste great. Will try their cocktails next time.

“A Hidden Gem with Delicious Food!”

Had a wonderful dining experience at this bistro! The food was absolutely delicious—fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. Every dish was cooked to perfection, and you can really taste the quality of the ingredients. The atmosphere was cozy and inviting, making it a great spot to relax and enjoy a meal. The staff were friendly and attentive, adding to the overall great experience. I will definitely be coming back soon! Highly recommend!
"Everything was fantastic! The service was so friendly and attentive, and the food was absolutely delicious. I really enjoyed my meal, and I'll definitely be back!"
First time trying Singapore Sling here, taste good. The service is great, the staff patiently explains the drinks for me. Will come back again.
